channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report I-2024040010
item.description:
Report I-2024040010

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-08T15:12:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-28
  • City: Jamaica
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 03/28/2024 this shipment had hidden dangerous goods that were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the at the DHL JFK service center, Bldg 263, JFK Int'l Airport, Jamaica, NY 11430 Transportation by road confirmed.
